snippet: Three generations of Mets fans are torn on whether to go to Citi Field on Sunday for the Mets-Cubs game or enjoy the day free of potentially bad baseball.
abstract: Three generations of Mets fans are torn on whether to go to Citi Field on Sunday for the Mets-Cubs game or enjoy the day free of potentially bad baseball.

headline.main: A Father's Day Quandary: Go See the Mets or Not
